text: a while back I ditched my Mac laptop and
went to Windows 10 and I'm never going
back here's why I used to use them back
in my everyday life until I decided to
give Windows 10 ago kind of an
experiment what I didn't expect was to
love it as much as I did
especially when it's paired up with
Microsoft's first ever laptop the
surface book in fact I like the windows
10 and surface book combo better than
any of the macros have ever owned the
biggest reason to love Windows 10 is
Microsoft voice assistant for comics not
only can Cortana search your files in
folders but she can show me my full
calendar with one touch plus news
headlines and not to mention she's
really great at reminding me of stuff
like meeting in frequent flyer miles
sure the Mac in theory but I found her
to be pretty limited compared with
Cortana and another big plus Cortana let
you ask questions using your keyboard so
you don't have to shout at your computer
in public another thing I really liked
about Windows 10 is how it lets you use
a stylus to take notes especially on
Microsoft's own surface devices the
closest thing apple has is the Apple
temple for the iPad pro but the iPad
doesn't run full desktop application so
it's not even a fair comparison beyond
all of that there are some things that
Windows has always been good at windows
users have always had access to way more
new game and some games never even make
it to the Mac now the downside is
Windows 10 is still Windows and I've
definitely run into little glitches and
errors here and there that require a
restart meanwhile I can't remember the
last time that happened with my Mac and
Apple is always upgrading their desktop
and iOS software so who knows what the
Mac's will look like in another year
after being a long time back user
Windows 10 was a pleasant surprise
I have intended to go back to the back
at the end of my experiment but now I
plan on making Windows 10 by digital
home for a long time to come
